tool_description: A  Powerful optical image character recognition (OCR) for over 20 languages and with machine-zone readable support. Ideal for a wide range of use-cases, including but not limited to receipt and invoice scanning as well as general image-based text retrieval, the default service allows you to POST a images up to 5MB for analysis. If you require larger images, or PDF scans, please contact us for an invitation to a custom plan.
name: OCR text extract
title: OCR text extract

api_list.name: Extract text from Image via URL
api_list.description: Perform OCR on an image located at designated URI and return the text detected
